Name: GitHub - Create Release
Description: Create a release for a Github Repository.
Author: alfhenrik

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody: $formattedVersionNumber = [string]::Format("v{0}", $versionNumber)$isDraft = [bool]::Parse($draft)$isPrerelease = [bool]::Parse($preRelease)$releaseData = @{    tag_name = $formattedVersionNumber;    target_commitish = $commitId;    name = $formattedVersionNumber;    body = $releaseNotes;    draft = $isDraft;    prerelease = $isPrerelease;}$releaseParams = @{    Uri = "https://api.github.com/repos/$gitHubUsername/$gitHubRepository/releases";    Method = 'POST';    Headers = @{        Authorization = 'Basic ' + [Convert]::ToBase64String(            [Text.Encoding]::ASCII.GetBytes($gitHubApiKey + ":x-oauth-basic")        );    }    ContentType = 'application/json';    Body = (ConvertTo-Json $releaseData -Compress)}Write-Host "Creating release $formattedVersionNumber for $commitId."$result = Invoke-RestMethod @releaseParamsWrite-Host "Release successfully created."$result

Parameters.Name: versionNumber
Parameters.Label: Version Number
Parameters.HelpText: The version number for this release

Parameters.Name: commitId
Parameters.Label: Commitish
Parameters.HelpText: Specifies the commitish value that determines where the Git tag is created from. Can be any branch or commit SHA. Unused if the Git tag already exists.

Parameters.Name: releaseNotes
Parameters.Label: Release Notes
Parameters.HelpText: The notes to accompany this GitHub release. Defaults to the release notes of the release.

Parameters.Name: gitHubRepository
Parameters.Label: Repository
Parameters.HelpText: The repository to create the release for.

Parameters.Name: draft
Parameters.Label: Draft
Parameters.HelpText: Set to true to mark this as a draft release (not visible to users)

Parameters.Name: preRelease
Parameters.Label: PreRelease
Parameters.HelpText: Set to true to mark this as a pre-release version
